entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 40%
